turn.1: What is Love Plus One by Haircut One Hundred?
turn.2: Love Plus One "Love Plus One" is a 1982 single by the British new wave band Haircut One Hundred from their debut album "Pelican West".
turn.4: It was the band's biggest hit in their native UK, where it reached No. 3 and was certified gold by the BPI for sales in excess of 400,000 copies.
turn.5: Was this single released in the US?
turn.6: The single was the band's only hit in the United States, where it peaked at No. 37 on the "Billboard" Hot 100 chart.
turn.7: Did they receive any awards for this single?
turn.8: The song ranked at No. 90 on VH1's "100 Greatest One Hit Wonders of the 80s".
